title: FSIS Issues Public Health Alert for Chicken and Pork Products Produced without the Benefit of Inspection
summary: WASHINGTON, Jan. 24, 2018 The U.S. Department of Agriculture's (USDA) Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) is issuing a public health alert because Pigeon Caterers, Inc., doing business as Carnival Brands, a New Orleans, La. establishment, produced and distributed approximately 140 pounds of a chicken...

establishment.name: Pigeon Caterers, Inc
establishment.address:
5900 S. Front St. 
  New Orleans, LA 70115

impacted_products: 6 oz. plastic containers containing CAJUN MAC with ENJOY BY dates of May 17, 2017 through Jan. 20, 2018.
